CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 26, 1953, pg. 30 reads: "B. And P. Members Present Clock - B.H. Logan, chairman of the board of directors of the Aged Ministers and Laymen Home on Oakwood Street, smiles as he accepts a gift of an electric clock for the home from Mrs. Marian E. Bryant, president of the Pittsburgh Chapter of the National Association of Negro Business and Professional Women's Clubs, Inc. Other members of the club who look on as the presentation is made are, left to right, Mrs. Inez Enty Simmons, Mrs. Grace Ross, Mrs. C.C. Payne, Mrs. Juanita Hannon Page, Mrs. Marthenia McClain and Mrs. Florence Ball Jones. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: B.H. Logan, accepting clock from Marian E. Bryant, standing between onlookers, from left: Inez Enty Simmons, Grace Ross, C.C. Payne, Juanita Hannon Page, Marthenia McClain, and Florence Ball Jones, posed in interior with patterned carpet, two stained glass windows, piano, and two female portraits
